termsandcondition.text: A successful referral is defined as a referred customer who does a meeting or places an order with LHome and pays 5% of total order value.
You will be eligible for a Rs.10,000 referral bonus per successful referral. Rs. 2500 for a successful meeting and Rs. 7500 for a successful order.
Your payment Rs. 2500 will be processed after a successful meeting.Rs. 7500 payment will be processed after any referred person makes a payment of 5% of the total order value.
Your payment will be processed directly to the account linked with your profile
Minimum value of the referred order should be Rs. 4 Lacs woodwork.
Customers already existing in the LHome system will not be considered for the referral scheme.
Referral bonus cannot be combined or adjusted against any existing payment.
LHome reserves the right to end any or all the offers at its sole discretion without any prior notice.
LHome reserves the right to deny any suspected illegitimate case.
